name: SetUp
_source: # More dialogue here could definitely be good
speak;Bordeaux;I am Bordeaux, master of arms for Lord Morrissey.{w}{br}I have no intention of surrendering this battle.

speak;Narrator;Bordeaux is a <icon>Ruler</> Ruler, granting him enhanced battlefield capabilities.{w}{br}He will gain an additional action whenever one of your units ends their turn.{w}{br}However, if broken, he will not be able to move until his next turn.;StyleNid=hint
speak;Luther;Tread carefully, this is much more than a training bout.
speak;Luther;Lord Morrissey intends this as a test.
speak;Luther;Our performance here will determine the nature of our relationship.
speak;Simon;Why? Wasn't surviving the siege proof enough?
speak;Simon;I suppose our goal is the same.
speak;Simon;Defeating his commander should "prove" our capability.
